name: Moe's Body Shop
description:
Created for HauntedPS1's Summer of Screams

Horrible visions of a destroyed building come rushing to you night after night. At first you wrote them off as bad dreams, night terrors, but now a voice calls out to you "COME AND SEE". You can't ignore it any more. 

You have to go to Moe's Body Shop.

Controls:

WASD to move

LShift to sprint

E to interact

Credits: 

Code, Art, etc: CapnWes

Music:

Rev. Hunter L. Maish - http://innerzonemusic.bandcamp.com/
